/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on STRs for Merchant Marine service, including
availability of STRs for merchant mariners
requesting PHS) medical records from the Health Resources and Services Administration (HSRA)
how to request PHS records from HSRA
action to take if unable to provide required information to HSRA
locating records of military or overseas treatment for merchant mariners
information concerning treatment of merchant mariners onboard a ship
, and
PHS records for Merchant Marine treatment more than 50 years ago
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B - Obtaining Merchant Marine Service Records
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B
